entries.name: buf
entries.desc: Buffer contained the marshalled, unknown object.

entries.name: name
entries.desc: The name of the unknown thing. Class name for unknown objects; variable name for unknown constants.

entries.name: exception()
entries.desc: Create a DRbUnknownError exception containing this object.

entries.name: reload()
entries.desc: Attempt to load the wrapped marshalled object again.
